      • match

        public boolean match(Version version,
            int cmp)
        Description copied from interface: VersionMatch
        Determines if the pattern in this VersionMatch matches the given Version based on the given comparison code. Comparison code values are: 0 - match only if version numbers match the pattern -1 - match if the version numbers <= the pattern 1 - match if the version numbers >= the pattern Wildcard values are considered to match any comparison code
        Specified by:
        match in interface VersionMatch
        Parameters:
        version - the Version to match against
        cmp - integer comparision code
        Returns:
        true if this pattern matches the given Version else false
